title: The Sphere Could be Headed to Your City (With a Smaller Footprint)
full_text: The Sphere Could be Headed to Your City (With a Smaller Footprint). The company behind Vegas’s Sphere venue announced plans to bring a smaller version of its venue to the National Harbor in D.C, and more could be coming to additional cities.. The company behind Las Vegass Sphere announced plans on Monday to bring a smaller version of the orb-shaped venue to the National Harbor outside Washington, D.C. The Sphere, which is covered by a gi… [+2382 chars]
